metadata.title: CVE-2012-5340 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: SumatraPDF 2.1.1/MuPDF 1.0 allows remote attackers to cause an IntegerOverflow in the lex_number() function via a corrupt PDF file.

criterions.comment: mupdf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was not-affected').
